summary: Provides an evaluator that measures how well a sentence embedding model can identify paraphrase (duplicate) sentence pairs in a large corpus by mining similar pairs, comparing them to a ground‑truth duplicate set, and computing ranking and classification metrics such as average precision, precision, recall, optimal similarity threshold and F1 score.
business_intent: Enables developers and researchers to benchmark and improve sentence embedding models for tasks like duplicate detection, content de‑duplication, semantic search, and data cleaning, ensuring higher quality downstream applications.
